name: Sanctuary-Stop
description: reality around you warps around you and all monsters are frozern in place for 10 seconds.
message: A color-negative aura holds even time still.

name: Guinsoo's Rage
apply_message: Your rage builds with each strike!
remove_message: You return to your normal speed.

name: Guinsoo's Haste
description: You throttle your gunblade engine.
A blade once used by a berserker to defend his homeland.
This special capacitor inside the buster cannon allows you to overcharge the UPS intake and shoot a large explosive blast of energy.
A miniature crossbow fitted over the wrist of the prosthetic arm, able to hold up to 10 bolts of any kind, and has an ergonomic magazine slot to help reduce reloading times.
A weapon used by an unsung warrior, lost in the struggles of fate.

This weapon was reluctantly made by a scientist who believed humans and robots could coexist in harmony. The last remnant of his legacy is this weapon: a tool designed for hunting reploids, the very creations he believed would usher an era of peace between humans and robots. One can only imagine, was there any hope of escaping fate in the first place?

name: Vile Stun Shot
description: A stasis-blast freezes your target in place.
message: A color-negative aura holds even time still.

description: Vile has made some custom modifications to his shoulder cannon compared to the standard issue police unit. There is a makeshift capacitor resembling an ammo belt that allows for auxiliary multi-thread processors to aid in increasing the fire rate and lowering the UPS cost of the gun, though this can only be used to fire a barrage of 100 bullets.
A large shoulder-mounted minigun that shoots energy projectiles at a high fire rate, considered overkill to most though it's actually a standard issue police weapon in 20XX.
summon 3-7 grenade manhacks
//: level 20 will max out your number of summons

description: Use to summon 2-7 grenade hacks at will. Caution: using this puts your name into the dead pool.
Deals bullet damage

//: You can get 'em for over US$1K if you want.  This is a fairly cheap remake.
description: These two ornate twin pistols are modified with extended barrels and custom receivers to shoot .308 rounds out of an enlarged m1911 chassis. On the left face along the barrel of Ebony is engraved the words 'Ebony & Ivory' in golden cursive font, while along the right face of Ivory reads 'For Tony Redgrave, By .45 ACP Art Warks'. Little about this weapons construction makes sense, though it is certainly a suitable tool for killing demons.

This monstrous weapon resembles a browning HMG, though a dual barrel firing mechanism protrudes from the custom-built receiver, allowing for shots to be fired out of each barrel in an alternating pattern. The gigantic gun also lacks a mount attachment, and it's trigger system rests on top of the weapon where the sights would normally go, indicating that this weapon is somehow meant to be wielded without even bracing it against your shoulder, rather it's meant to be held in a reverse grip similar to a tonfa. Is it the weapon itself that earns the title, or simply the previous user capable of wielding this behemoth?
A devil-breaker designed to fit over the arm and enhance demon-slaying capabilities. this particular model enhances its user's mobility.

name: Gerbera Jump
description: gunbreaker dash spell.

A devil-breaker designed to fit over the arm and enhance demon-slaying capabilities. this particular model was the first to be built and tested on live demons, it's functionality is quite simple: it shoots electricity at your foes.
A devil-breaker designed to fit over the arm and enhance demon-slaying capabilities. this particular model commands the ability to stop time.

description: reality around you warps around you and all monsters are frozern in place for 10 seconds.
message: A color-negative aura holds even time still.

description: A crystalline arrow with magical properties, not the most durable ammo, but extremely lethal.

A crystalline arrow with magical properties, not the most durable ammo, but extremely lethal.
A crystalline arrow with magical properties, not the most durable ammo, but extremely lethal.
A scimitar used by a renowned pirate to bring himself from the brink of death after a bad deal lead to his demise. Some say he still roams the seas seeking revenge.
With an intense ritual that resembles crossfit, you manage to put some of your pain at bay.

description: reality around you warps around you and all monsters are frozern in place for 10 seconds.

name: Force Push

description: A six-foot bow made from multiple materials for increased energy efficiency.  Complicated to make, but stronger than an all-wood longbow.

description: This is an early modern sword seeing use in the 16th, 17th, and 18th centuries.  Called 'broad' to contrast with the slimmer rapiers.

name: Aegis Storm-Breaker (Argentium)
description: A frost-breaker with a shielded hilt allowing for more protection, part of which can be detached and held as a buckler for even more defense.

use_action.msg: Your hilt detaches from your blade and remains in the air beside you.

name: Shield-form Aegis Storm-Breaker (Argentium)
description: By releasing a mechanism on the hilt of the blade the protective shield now floats beside you.

use_action.msg: You reattach the hilt to the blade.
